short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to create and manage search contexts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you the ability to add a new custom right-click menu when you right-clicking on anything! It's 100% Customizeable!

- You can select from our 12000 website options and choose where the right click appear!
- Make a custom one if you need more!
- Use custom title, custom links, and custom context anywhere!

It's easy, It's fast, It's SUPER SEARCH!
